discussion.content: A Is correct according to FortiOS 7.2 Admin Guide p2656. But could not find a prove for D. I think D should be correct as well

choices.D: They may contain physical and/or virtual interfaces.
choices.C: Forwarding Domain only applies to virtual interfaces.
choices.B: Port Pairing works only for physical interfaces.
choices.A: They both create separate broadcast domains.

questions.question_text: Which statements are correct for port pairing and forwarding domains? (Choose two.)
In transparent mode, forward-domain is an CLI setting associate with ___________.

discussion.content: C is correct according to FortiOS 7.2 Admin Guide p2656

choices.C: 1. unit priority, 2. up time, 3. port monitor, 4. serial number.
choices.A: 1. port monitor, 2. unit priority, 3. up time, 4. serial number.
choices.B: 1. port monitor, 2. up time, 3. unit priority, 4. serial number.
choices.D: 1. up time, 2. unit priority, 3. port monitor, 4. serial number.

discussion.content: B is correct accord to FGT 7.2 Infra Guide p 294

questions.question_text: Which of the following sequences describes the correct order of criteria used for the selection of a master unit within a FortiGate high availability (HA) cluster when override is disabled?

choices.B: The device this command is executed on is likely to switch from master to slave status if override is enabled.
choices.D: This command resets the uptime variable used in the HA algorithm so it may cause a new master to become elected.
choices.C: This command has no impact on the HA algorithm.
choices.A: The device this command is executed on is likely to switch from master to slave status if override is disabled.

questions.question_text: Which of the following statements are correct about the HA command diagnose sys ha reset- uptime? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: AD correct accord to FGT Infra 7.2 p294

questions.question_text: What are the requirements for a HA cluster to maintain TCP connections after device or link failover? (Choose two.)

choices.D: Connections must not be handled by a proxy.
choices.C: Connections must be UDP or ICMP.

discussion.content: AD are correct according to FGT 7.2 Infra Guide p 309 and p312
